about_the_game:
“Down In The Dark” is a tough and uncompromising game in the modern version of «beat ‘em up» genre, where you stand against the hordes of enemies. You play as a police detective Terry, who wakes up in the dark city completely isolated from the outside world. You have to fight your way out through the streets of Manhattan flooded with brutal gangs and criminals.


Game Features:

  • A one of-a-kind combination of genres:
    2D pixel action-adventure with elements of beat 'em up and puzzle games.
  • Dynamic gameplay:
    Blood-filled fights using a variety of weapons and firearms; chases, puzzles and resource management.
  • Original characters:
    Plenty of enemies, charismatic NPCs and terrifying gang leaders.
  • Modification System:
    Discover new attack combos and loads of parts for the garage to soup up your cars.
  • Engaging plot:
    Deeply developed detective story taken place on the Manhattan Island turned in maximum-security prison.
  • Aesthetics:
    Sleek music along with pixel graphics for an 1980s feel.

content_descriptors.notes: Down In The Dark contains Violence, Blood and Gore, Sexual Themes, Use of Drugs, Strong Language.

name: Down In The Dark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 - bit or above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.3 Ghz or AMD Phenom X4 2.3 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 5770 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 - bit or above
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Quad Core 2.3 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670, AMD Radeon HD 7970 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Medo
Atos criminosos
Violência
Temas sensíveis
Drogas lícitas
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: The world has been plunged into a darkness of chaos and violence. The streets of the city are full of ruthless bandits and murderers. Get ready for furious battles, wild chases, puzzles, upgrades and discover new characters in each chapter of this action-packed detective story.
